DOC.brief_summary: Aspheric intraocular lenses can effectively reduce higher-order aberrations and improve contrast sensitivity function after cataract surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Spherical Aberration and Contrast Sensitivity Function in Eyes Implanted With Spherical and Aspheric Intraocular Lenses: A Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Senile cataract Glaucoma, corneal opacity, retinal abnormality, previous history
